summary: Public Enemy is an American hip-hop group started by Chuck D and Flavor Flav in 1985. They're known for songs about politics and racism. Their first two albums, *Yo! Bum Rush the Show* (1987) and *It Takes a Nation of Millions* (1988), were huge hits. The group has had many members over the years, but Chuck D and Flavor Flav have always been the main ones. They've won many awards and were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2013.
title: Public Enemy
